entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.11.2
entry.content:
Config üëÄing

If you're using the config.yaml file. Kiosk will not watch it for changes and will update the config and reload all connected clients.

API calls

Kiosk will now wait for 10 secs before deciding an api has failed. It will also retry 3 times before giving up and going for a walk on the beach.

YAML

If your config.yaml file is not valid, Kiosk will not let you know and tell you what the issue is.

Image ID

Added show_image_id just for Zeus because he asked nicely.

Port

Added kiosk.port option for more advanced configs.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • Immich API call improvements by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/116
  • auto config reload on change and refresh endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/118
  • better yaml error logging by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/119

‚ö° Fixes

  • show_date not showing when show_time is false fix by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/117
  • Include exposure time by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/121
  • better yaml error handling by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/122

Other changes

  • add image ID to metadata by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/123
  • changeable kiosk port by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.11.1...v0.11.2

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.11.3
entry.content:
Config mount

I am moving the config.yaml mount from:

yaml volumes: # Mounting single file - ./config.yaml:/config.yaml to

yaml volumes: # Mount the directory with config.yaml inside - ./config:/config

This is to fix permission issues when watch_config is set to true. At the moment you may use either of these.

Splitview Landscape

Added layout=splitview-landscape. Which works the same as splitview but with landscape images being stacked.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.12.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING] image_zoom has been deprecated.

image_effect

image_effect has replace image_zoom.

image_effect currently has two options. zoom and smart-zoom.

Zoom

This effect zooms in or out to add movement to your images, with the center of the image as the focal point.

Smart zoom

Smart zoom works like the regular zoom but focuses on faces and includes both zooming and panning.

Docs for image_effect

Weather

Single view with weather

Splitview with weather

You can now add the current weather to Kiosk. You can configure multiple locations in the config.yaml file, and choose which one to display using the URL query weather=NAME.

```yaml

config.yaml

weather: - name: london lat: 51.5285262 lon: -0.2663999 api: API_KEY unit: metric lang: en

  • name: new-york lat: 40.6973709 lon: -74.1444838 api: API_KEY unit: imperial lang: en ```

Docs for weather

Hiding countries from image metadata.

This is useful if you don't want to display certain country names after setting show_image_location to true.

Example I live in the UK, so most image location metadata looks something like Islington, London, United Kingdom. Adding the below to my config.yaml file would change that to Islington, London

yaml hide_countries: - United Kingdom - United States of America

What's Changed

  • image_zoom has been replace with image_effect
  • smart zoom by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/146

üöÄ New Features

  • add weather data by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/151

üî® Maintenance

Other changes

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.13.0
entry.content:
Navigation Controls

You can interact with Kiosk in three ways: touch, mouse, or keyboard.

Touch & Click Zones

Kiosk's display is divided into interactive zones:

  1. Left Side: Previous image(s)
  2. Center top: Pause/Play and Toggle Menu
  3. Right Side: Next image(s)

Keyboard Shortcuts

| Key | Action | |---------------|-------------------------------| | _ Spacebar | Play/Pause and Toggle Menu | | ‚Üê Left Arrow | Previous Image(s) | | ‚Üí Right Arrow | Next Image(s) |

show_image_description

Display image description from METADATA (if available).

use_original_image

Use the original image rather then the preview. NOTE: This will mostly likely cause kiosk to use more CPU and RAM resources.

fetched_assets_size

The number of assets (data) requested from Immich per api call. min=1 max=1000.

http_timeout

The number of seconds before an http request will time out.

frameless

Remove borders and rounded corners around images.

Clock screensaver in sleep mode

The clock will now change position periodically while on sleep mode (if enabled) to prevent screen burn.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • added image metadata description option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/175
  • Added next/prev image navigation by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/176
  • added clock screensaver in sleep mode by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/177
  • added use_original_image setting by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/179
  • added option to limit fetched asset(s) data by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/180

‚ö° Fixes

  • http request pooling by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/161
  • automatically lowercase config values by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/162
  • remove seconds from image metadata time (24hr) by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/165
  • remove prefixed comma in image metadata location by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/166
  • moved next/prev/control hit areas by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/178
  • portrait image displaying in splitview-landscape layout by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/182

  • http request improvements by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/170
